metadata.Title: CVE-2015-2152 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Xen 4.5.x and earlier enables certain default backends when emulating a VGAdevice for an x86 HVM guest qemu even when the configuration disables them,which allows local guest users to obtain access to the VGA console by (1)setting the DISPLAY environment variable, when compiled with SDL support,or connecting to the VNC server on (2) ::1 or (3) 127.0.0.1, when notcompiled with SDL support.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-2152` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxen-4.4 - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.4
libxen-ocaml - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.4
libxenstore3.0 - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.4
xen-hypervisor-4.1-amd64 - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.4
xen-hypervisor-4.3-amd64 - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.4
xen-hypervisor-4.3-armhf - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.4
xen-hypervisor-4.4-amd64 - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.4
xen-hypervisor-4.4-arm64 - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.4
xen-hypervisor-4.4-armhf - 4.4.1-0ubuntu0.14.04.4
